dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT DISTINCT a.job_xid job_no, a.charter_voyage_xid booking_no, glog_util.remove_domain(a.servprov_gid) carrier, oref.order_release_refnum_value loc_code, glog_util.remove_domain(sip.involved_party_contact_gid) shipper, DECODE(a.SI_EDI,'Y',TO_CHAR(a.EDI_DATE,'MM/DD/YY'),'N',TO_CHAR(a.MANUAL_DATE,'MM/DD/YY')) submit_date, DECODE(a.SI_EDI,'Y','EDI','N','Manual') manual_edi, glog_util.remove_domain(a.update_user) submit_user, glog_util.remove_domain(a.source_location_gid) source_loc, glog_util.remove_domain(a.dest_location_gid) dest_loc, cvref.charter_voyage_refnum_value doc_cutoff, TO_CHAR(a.departure_date,'MM/DD/YY') etd, TO_CHAR(a.arrival_date,'MM/DD/YY') eta, (CASE WHEN js.status_value_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.JOB_CANCELLED' THEN 'Cancelled' ELSE 'Not Cancelled' END) cancel_ind FROM (SELECT job_gid, job_xid, charter_voyage_gid, charter_voyage_xid, order_release_gid, shipment_gid, servprov_gid, update_date, update_user, source_location_gid, dest_location_gid, departure_date, arrival_date, SI_EDI, EDI_DATE, SI_MANUAL, MANUAL_DATE FROM (SELECT j.job_gid, j.job_xid, cv.charter_voyage_gid, cv.charter_voyage_xid, ssul.order_release_gid, s.shipment_gid, s.servprov_gid, ss1.update_date, DECODE(ss1.status_value_gid, 'SCOULAR/NVO.SHIPPING INSTRUCTIONS_SENT',ss1.update_user,ss2.update_user) update_user, cv.source_location_gid, cv.dest_location_gid, cv.departure_date, cv.arrival_date, DECODE(ss1.status_value_gid, 'SCOULAR/NVO.SHIPPING INSTRUCTIONS_SENT', 'Y', 'N') SI_EDI, TRUNC(ss1.update_date) EDI_DATE, DECODE(ss2.status_value_gid, 'SCOULAR/NVO.SHIPPING_INSTRUCTIONS_MANUAL_SENT', 'Y','N') SI_MANUAL, TRUNC(ss2.update_date) MANUAL_DATE FROM job j INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sessuj.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' AND s.perspective = 'B' INNER JOIN shipment_status ss1 ON s.shipment_gid = ss1.shipment_gid AND ss1.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.SHIPPING INSTRUCTIONS' INNER JOIN shipment_status ss2 ON s.shipment_gid = ss2.shipment_gid AND ss2.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.SHIPPING_INSTRUCTIONS_MANUAL' INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sr ON s.shipment_gid = sr.shipment_gid AND sr.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' INNER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON 'SCOULAR/NVO.' || sr.shipment_refnum_value = cv.charter_voyage_gid WHERE (ss1.status_value_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.SHIPPING INSTRUCTIONS_SENT' OR ss2.status_value_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.SHIPPING_INSTRUCTIONS_MANUAL_SENT') AND (:CARRIER_ID IS NULL OR (NOT :CARRIER_ID IS NULL AND s.servprov_gid = :CARRIER_ID)) AND (:USER_ID IS NULL OR (NOT :USER_ID IS NULL AND s.update_user = :USER_ID))) WHERE DECODE(SI_EDI||SI_MANUAL,'YY',EDI_DATE,'YN',EDI_DATE,'NY',MANUAL_DATE) >= TO_DATE(:START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND DECODE(SI_EDI||SI_MANUAL,'YY',EDI_DATE,'YN',EDI_DATE,'NY',MANUAL_DATE) <= TO_DATE(:END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) a LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvref ON a.charter_voyage_gid = cvref.charter_voyage_gid AND cvref.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_DOC CLOSING TIME' LEFT OUTER JOIN order_release_refnum oref ON a.order_release_gid = oref.order_release_gid AND oref.order_release_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip ON a.shipment_gid = sip.shipment_gid AND sip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'SHIPPER' LEFT OUTER JOIN job_status js ON a.job_gid = js.job_gid AND js.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.JOB_CANCELLED' ORDER BY a.job_xid
